pageContext.collection: Unknown,sold by Seaby Coins, Ltd., Audley House, 11 Margaret Street, London, WIN 8AT,Bulletin 749, January 1981,Bought in a House Sale in N. Gloucestershire area,Apparently gone to a private collection in Kent.
pageContext.site: England,Kent,Saltwood,"Found at Saltwood, Hythe, Kent; 7.1929 Faversham" - loose label attached (Peter Clayton - pers. comm.), presumably bough at Faversham in July 1923: conceivably from the Haines Hill, Saltwood hoard found June 4, 1872 - for which Evans records 8 spearheads - not all now extant?
